pages.text: Events $5 Happy Hour Monday January 19th Every Weekday (Mon - Fri) Clock out and enjoy the best deal of the week. Every Monday through Friday from 4–7 p.m., grab $5 select drinks and bar snacks like Fried Pickles, Mac ‘n Cheese Bites, and Loaded Fries. It’s the easiest win of the day. 04:00 PM - 07:00 PM Tacos. Soft pretzels, with brick cheese, and mustard Shrimp Po’ Boy and fries Fried Green Tomatoes, with dipping sauce Assorted beer taps Caesar Salad, with romaine, parmesan, croutons, and Caesar dressing Chef Salad Cheeseburger Egg Rolls, with dipping sauce Burger with pimento cheese, bacon, fried green tomato, and fries A glass of beer Crowded dining area Shredded Wedge Salad, top view Loaded Fries what people say Review by - Google Nathan P: Great spot for lunch, good food and drinks, Low Country Burger was awesome!!! Review by - Google Susan P: This was the best restaurant we went to during our time in Charleston. Went on Thursday evening for drinks and then took food back to the hotel... Review by - Google Kaitlyn A: Wonderful restaurant and bar. Laid back, affordable, excellent service! Boyfriend had Texan Burger and said it was amazing... Review by - Google Kayla D: Very relaxed chill atmosphere. The food was great bar food. We got 1 of almost every appetizer, a meal each, plus drinks... Review by - Google Spencer L: Great experience! Cheese bites and the wings are so good! Great atmosphere for kids thru the day as well adults. Definitely a must check it out.
